mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.sbmc AS "sbmc", a.pp AS "pp", a.xh AS "xh", a.sl AS "sl", a.sbjg AS "sbjg", a.trsynf AS "trsynf", a.doc_id AS "doc_id"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_yjbylsbpz_ykebyhk( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, ykebyhk_sbmc, ykebyhk_pp, ykebyhk_xh, ykebyhk_sl, ykebyhk_sbjg, ykebyhk_trsynf, doc_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{ykebyhk_sbmc}, #{ykebyhk_pp}, #{ykebyhk_xh}, #{ykebyhk_sl}, #{ykebyhk_sbjg}, #{ykebyhk_trsynf}, #{doc_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_yjbylsbpz_ykebyhk SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, ykebyhk_sbmc = #{ykebyhk_sbmc}, ykebyhk_pp = #{ykebyhk_pp}, ykebyhk_xh = #{ykebyhk_xh}, ykebyhk_sl = #{ykebyhk_sl}, ykebyhk_sbjg = #{ykebyhk_sbjg}, ykebyhk_trsynf = #{ykebyhk_trsynf}, doc_id = #{doc_id} WHERE id = #{id}
